page.title: 10Pastimes
page.content: {Netball} is a game normally played by two teams of girls on a court 100 feet long and 50 feet wide. The object is to score goals by throwing the ball through a net at the top of a pole. The players must stand still whilst holding the ball and pass it from player to player until it is possible to take a shot at goal. The team scoring the most goals will be the winner. {Stickers} are pieces of card with glue on the back. They come in various shapes, sizes and colours, and can be stuck to almost any surface. I stick some of mine neatly into a book so that I can count them. I started collecting stickers when I saw them in a shop and thought the looked attractive. I now spend about half of my pocket money each week on stickers.
